name: FolkloreHK
tag_list: contemporary-art, indian-handicrafts, wearable-art, antique-fashion, handmade-gifts, antique-gifts
description: Place for Contemporary Art, Wearable Art
overview:
The concept of FolkloreHK was born out of a passion for combining contemporary art with the idea of retaining antique designs and the traditional touch. We believe in history, maintaining constant touch with ones roots and aim to revive traditional art forms from across the world where every concept is hand-made.

In a world where technology dominates every aspect of our life and creates anything, the meticulous touch of an artisan possesses the potential to create handmade gifts and something that cannot be replicated.

I put myself in a buyers shoe and ask myself what would I like to have and the following come to mind - unique handicrafts, designs with an emphasis on quality where I see value for money.

How about I add one last aspect, where I can create all the above, and through the same give back something small to society in a way which would create a meaningful difference in someone’s life.This is exactly what Folklore HK strives to achieve through its Gift Shop Hong Kong business.
